Description:
Renovated Home And Amazing Shedding For Just The Right Price
This solid home has seen recent TLC with new floor coverings, a freshly painted colour-scheme and more. In fact a new kitchen which is open plan to the lounge & meals simply wins you over. The abode is set on a large allotment and grants vast spaces for family fun and amazing shedding. The home is three minutes to the hub of town and neighbours a public reserve.

Description:
Get Away From The Hustle & Bustle
Located in the quaint little township of Evansford and set on approx. ½ acre (2332sqm) with views over the surrounding countryside is this extremely neat 2 bedroom hardiplank home. Boasting 2 living areas, lounge with new bamboo flooring and a rumpus room. Updated kitchen with wood fire oven and spacious dining area. The bathroom boasts a relaxing spa bath and separate shower. Outside there is a return veranda that includes a fantastic decked outdoor entertaining area with views over the neighbouring dam. With neat gardens, double carport, workshop plus a large shed 11x 6m perfect for dad to tinker in and caravan access. Evansford is conveniently centrally located 30 mins to Ballarat and 20 mins to Maryborough. This is an extremely tidy package that will appeal to first home buyers, retirees and weekenders. Be quick, it won't last at this price!

Description:
Hidden Beauty in Caddy Drive
Located on the Ballarat side of Creswick this lovely 4 or 5 bedroom family home is waiting for you..
Move straight in, everything is here.
The home is connected to natural gas, has an updated kitchen, a dishwasher and an ample sized dining area. The Brivis ducted heating will take care of the whole house during the colder months, plus the option of reverse cycle split systems.
The home has plenty of space for all the family to visit, with the outdoor under cover entertaining/deck area. Great under cover parking at the front of the home for the family car and caravan, just hook on and head off!!
Do you like a round of golf? If so, the Creswick Golf course/Forest Resort is only a short distance up the road. Dining out, there are plenty of options in the Creswick CBD plus Forest Resort. Bus stop within close proximity to Ballarat Secondary schools, and Creswick offers 3 Primary schools, kindergarten and childcare facilities.
Ideal family home or invest property, contact our office to arrange your inspection.

Description:
Contemporary Living on Approx. 2.8 Acres
Nestled at the bottom of Springmount, this ranch like home constructed with buttery sandstone blocks offers views, acreage and 21st living accommodation. Framed by the rolling hills of Springmount, this property offers majestic gums to the forefront and cleared acreage of approx. 2.8 acres.
A full width front veranda provides a shaded space along Smokeytown Road whilst the alfresco area (nearing completion) provides long distance views along with an ideal space to entertain guests and/or family. Approx. 23 squares, this three year old home provides a luxury master with ensuite and walk in robes, while floorplan versatility is offered via two further double rooms and a generous study, which could also be used as a fourth bedroom as it also has BIR'S. Each bedroom also contains a ceiling fan. A contemporary bathroom (with feature tiling) and independent laundry create excellent facilities to all the bedrooms while also providing amenities to the entire home.
Completely open in design, the French provincial kitchen is beautifully presented with wooden benchtops, high end appliances and a large walk in pantry that offers huge storage benefits for country living. Loads of windows and glass doors flood the room with light and warmth which add to the heat generated from freestanding wood heater in the dining and family room. A separate lounge also offers a further place to unwind or ideally located to adapt to a rumpus or games room.
Energy efficient via 20 solar panels producing 4.5kW, this additional feature provides massive savings on those dreaded electricity bills. Whilst the home does not present with an attached garage, there is a massive shed with high clearance for vehicles, boats and/or caravans. Landscaping has begun via retaining walls and flat lawn beds, yet there is the opportunity to begin some planting in and around the house and shed. Typically Australian, this welcoming home offers friendship to passing neighbours of kangaroos, wombats or eagles who bring further animation to this country homestead. Set just 5 minutes from the bustling little township of Creswick, this property also offers a 20 minute commute to Ballarat city via Midland Highway. Call our agent for further details and arrange a private inspection asap.
Insights: 194 Smokeytown Road, Springmount VIC 3364 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
ROLLING HILLS WITH COSY HOME & GREAT SHEDDING
An inviting country setting with 3.3 tranquil acres, welcoming brick home, double garage with lined craft room/office, 30'x20' workshop/studio/bungalow, scattered gum trees & a peaceful country lifestyle. This appealing home comes complete with a spacious lounge, dining area, bright & sunny kitchen with new gas stove, 2 bedrooms with built in robes, verandas back & front, evaporative cooling & large entertaining area. An added extra is the ability of being self sufficient with tank & dam water, a 16 panel solar system that currently is being feed back into the grid & numerous vegetable gardens. We invite you to come see for yourself & enjoy this idyllic property positioned amongst scattered native trees in the beautiful rolling hills of Evansford.

Description:
Wondrous Historic Homestead
This stunning 3 bedroom brick Victorian residence is full of character and features one would expect from a home of its era. All rooms are of generous proportions, with a fireplace in each, bathroom with claw foot bath and a separate toilet and laundry. As expected from a Victorian home, it is filled with decorative features both inside and out. Ornate cornices, ceiling roses, stained glass feature panels at the entrance of the home, plus 12 foot ceilings, some original timber windows and a bull nose front verandah. A large kitchen with views into the rear garden creates a sense of space and tranquillity with the abode sitting on over 1000m2. The larger block also offers the opportunity for substantial gardens, the storage of a boat or caravan, or potential sub-division development (STCA).
This is a rare opportunity to own a historic home in largely untouched condition. If you are looking to restore a home of this era, look no further!

Description:
A Period charmer in the country!
Set amongst established trees and gardens in a peaceful 1 acre setting, this character filled home offers an idyllic country escape. The home offers a spacious master bedroom with ensuite, plus another 3 large bedrooms. The generously proportioned living areas include an open plan living/dining area plus a separate formal lounge complete with open fire. Further features of the home include timber floors, high ceilings, hydronic panel heating, split system AC and a wide veranda around the front and side of the home. Externally the property is surrounded by established gardens giving the property a beautiful old world charm, plus there is a double carport and sundry garden shedding.
Phil Hayward : 0419 107 112

Description:
Great Opportunity To Build Your Very Own Home.
Walking distance from the hub of town is this wondrous block on approx. 823m2. On the high side of the street, great views are had over the countryside giving a true sense of a tranquillity. A yard of this size allows for shedding, fun and games for the kids and pets too. Plans have been drawn for two townhouses or a large four bedroom family dwelling. Around the corner from school and shops the convenience is fantastic. With the added bonus of services connected, it makes this block of land a great opportunity with not much land available so close to town. Investors looking to build the townhouse could take full advantage of stamp duty savings and depreciation come tax time. Building here has you ten minutes to Ballarat or Clunes and a 20 minute drive to fabulous Daylesford. While Creswick itself is more and more become a trendy place to live with many new cafes and restaurants.

Description:
Just a two minute stroll to CBD
Here's an exciting opportunity to purchase a solidly built two bedroom town house on the fringe of Creswick's CBD. Easy walking distance to the main street, glorious parkland within minutes and sporting facilities close by. A generous floorplan includes two light filled bedrooms with spacious built-in robes, a family bathroom, separate toilet and an expansive laundry with large built-in cupboard. The lounge, dining and kitchen are in an L' shape design, which forms a clear delineation between the cosy lounge area and the entertaining/dining zone. The kitchen is laid out in a three point work triangle to ensure ease of operation for the chef when preparing meals with plenty of cupboard storage including a large pantry.
Outdoors also provides a further entertaining zone, with sun blinds forming a private enclosure to the pergola, while the single lock up garage provides cover for your vehicle. The garden has been designed with neat garden bed edges, with paving and full fencing creating a very private and low maintenance area. This townhouse is recommended for first home buyers or those empty nesters who just love to walk everywhere, or certainly a great buy for an investor. With wheel chair access, gas heating, NBN, security shutters and loads of natural light, this 360m2 property is nestled in an extra quiet neighbourhood with lovely views across to the nearby parkland. Call today for further details and inspection times.

Description:
Large Family Home set on Approx 2 Acres
Move in and enjoy a relaxed lifestyle - this investment offers: a generous allotment, a four bedroom brick veneer plus a self contained bungalow.
With panoramic views and 2 acres to play with, this property will suit all members of the family. Offering four bedrooms with built in robes, master with three double built ins, ensuite, spacious lounge, functional kitchen with adjoining meals area and double carport for drive through convenience. Warmed with a cosy gas log fire and providing gas cooking appliances, this home is naturally warmed from the large floor to ceiling windows and filtered light. Whether you have a teenager, live in parent or just have loads of over night visitors, this home with a self contained bungalow offers complete flexibility. You may wish to set up a craft room or art studio, the choice is all yours.
With outside paving, established trees and an easy maintainable garden, this home allows you to be as fussy as you like or as relaxed as you wish. This property also offers a fabulous 6 x 12m workshop and enough room for family pets to enjoy the freedom. With a chicken coup in the making and a greenhouse ready for propagations, this home certainly ticks all the boxes for self reliant living. Just a quick 15 minutes drive to the popular township of Daylesford and just a few minutes to the thriving township of Creswick, this home and lifestyle is the perfect combination. Escape the helter-skelter of city life, call our agent today and arrange an inspection.

Description:
Top Class Townhouse In Quiet Location
Set in a quiet complex of three townhouses, this exclusive ensemble of distinctive residences, blend traditional and modern to create a sophisticated three bedroom urban home. Surrounded by other well established homes and benefitting from proximity to the many amenities and facilities of the thriving township of Creswick, this home offers a contemporary edge with a low maintenance advantage and views over distant forest.
High quality carpets and slimline double window furnishings add to the energy efficiency, while the neutral tones and practical finishes add to clean lines and functionality of its cosy floor plan. The kitchen provides the most impact, with a feature brick wall adding a textured statement to the ample cupboards and drawers, while the practicality of the island bench doubles as a serviceable breakfast bar or preparation space. The dining area and living room flow on perfectly from the kitchen area to provide one fabulous room for open conversations and family get-togethers.
A lavish bathroom boasts a full size bath, elongated vanity and porthole window, along with a feature tiled shower and separate toilet for further convenience. The master is designed with built in robes and direct access to the bathroom, while the two other bedrooms and independent laundry offer built in robes and linen press for additional storage capacity. Ducted floor heating keeps your toes toasty and warm with the beneficial effect of hot air rises' for overall warmth.
A low maintenance pebble garden features to the front with a very private fully fenced paved courtyard with raised centre garden is on show to the rear. Vehicles are well covered with a double lock up garage with a practical internal access for home coming safety. This piece of real estate is a very practical and low maintenance acquisition that retirees, first home buyers and/or professional couples could easily enjoy. Speak to our agent as soon as possible about the fabulous features and inspection times of Unit 1,12 Bell Street.

Description:
EVERFLOWING TRANQUILITY - PRICE REDUCTION
A much loved family home for over 20 years, this property located eight minutes from Daylesford is the ideal home for someone looking to enter the property market and embrace the country lifestyle this kind of land affords.
Set on just over 5 acres of rural land with two large dams there is more water than you can poke a stick at. The house features two bedrooms with built in robes, open plan kitchen and living area with a wood fire and split system. Kangaroos, echidnas and native wildlife all in your front yard!
- 2 bedrooms with built in robes
- 1 bathroom
- 2 dams and permanent running creek
- Shed with carport
- Established fruit trees, garden and vegetable patch
- 2 x 20,000 concrete tanks
Inspection by appointment.

Description:
AFFORDABLE INVESTMENT PROPERTY ON DOUBLE BLOCK
Are you looking for an affordable investment property with future development opportunities (STCA)? Then look no further. The property is to be tenanted at $200 per week from 13th August, 2015 until 13th February, 2016. This charming three bedroom weatherboard cottage has been updated throughout. Freshly painted inside and out, new carpet, updated kitchen and renovated bathroom. Three generous bedrooms and extra separate powered bungalow which may be converted to a fourth bedroom or left as is for a studio/office. Light-filled living area with gas heating and airconditioning. Updated kitchen/meals area with new cabinetry, stainless steel splashbacks and spotless original St George double oven. Renovated bathroom with shower and vanity and separate toilet. Garage space is covered with a double powered lock-up garage with large workshop area and loads of off-street parking. All of this on a large allotment of 1881m2 (approx.) with possible future development opportunities (STCA) and within walking distance to shops and newly upgraded railway station connecting to Melbourne, Ballarat and surrounds.
CONTACT ALISA JOHNSON ON 0409 935 766 OR AT THE MARYBOROUGH OFFICE SITUATED AT 94 HIGH STREET, MARYBOROUGH VIC 3465 ON (03) 5460 5100
Alisa Johnson : 0409 935 766

Description:
Grant Your Family More Than 2.5 Acres Of Carefree Lifestyle
This solid timber home is set on approximately 9800m2. North facing the abode gets great natural light and along with the timber walls and cathedral ceilings leaves an amazing sense of warmth and comfort. There is heating and cooling for all year comfort. The occupier enjoys a scenic 360 degree view of countryside and bush land. All bedroom sizes are vast, while the master also offers a walk in robe and ensuite. The functional kitchen with walk in pantry looks out to lovely gardens, an entertainment area and kids playing. There's fantastic shedding with tandem carport and a 12x6.7m garage for suit the handy man or car collector. Wether the yard is for family fun, a horse or two or just a sense of space, convenience of being 3 minutes to the hub of town or 7 minutes to Wendouree makes this property fun and convenient.

20 Acres of peace and quiet
Take the opportunity to go gold detecting and bush walking with this idyllic parcel of land, bordered by State Forest with plenty of privacy to get away from it all. Zoned Rural Conservation and located just a few minutes drive from Historic Talbot town centre.
For more information please contact Jo Millar 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers 0437 456 908

Description:
A Private Family Home With Great Proportions Inside & Out
In a quiet little street of Creswick this warm and spacious home has been cherished over its time. The formal lounge and dining overlooks the front garden and captures the morning sun. The kitchen is open plan to the casual meals and lounge area. This leads out to the pergola area and the huge family sized yard. Those with extra cars or just enjoy a man-cave will appreciate the 6x9m garage. The home has great heating and cooling for all year comfort.

Description:
Modern Gem With Spectacular Views
This home has been engineered and constructed under the guidance of Ballarat University, which reassures any purchaser that this home is: top class, accurate and offers complete attention to detail from start to finish. Just three years old, this country residence offers a contemporary design throughout with three spacious bedrooms, a large open plan kitchen, dining and living area, along with a generous family bathroom and independent laundry.
With natural gas connected, this home offers natural gas cooking, wood heating in the living room plus a split system for extra convenience and ambient temperature control. Floor to ceiling windows provide plenty of natural light to filter through, whilst the neutral palette and cosy carpet form an easy and manageable combination of textures and warmth. A full width veranda to the front provides the perfect spot to relax and unwind, or head out to the massive elevated, split level rear deck which offers the perfect place to relax while overlooking the oval and natural bushland. A natural gas point is already installed to get your BBQ or outdoor heater up and running.
This sloping 650m2 allotment offers new colorbond fence and the additional under house storage creates extra features when storing or setting up children's play equipment. With some established trees and new plantings already taking shape, this property provides a private parkland right in your own backyard. Various walking tracks and St George Lake are virtually on your doorstep, which ensures plenty of attractions to keep family and friends entertained all year around. Just moments from the centre of Creswick and just 15 minutes to Ballarat city, this home would be absolutely ideal for first home buyers, retirees or just to downsize. Call our agent today for further details and inspection times.
